Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Monday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
